Name: institution
Value: Observational Health Data Analytics, Janssen Research & Development

Name: coh_chapter_title
Value: Multiple Myeloma, require 2 Dx in 90 days - anchor on 2nd, PL 294

Name: coh_definition_description
Value: At least one code for multiple myeloma (not including "in-remission" or "in-relapse"​codes), which must be preceded by at least 365 days of prior continuous observation, have an occurrence of multiple myeloma within the prior 90 days (which is the first occurrence ​in the patients history) and have exactly zero prior codes indicating history of multiple myeloma or multiple myeloma in remission. Cohort exit is end of continuous observation time.

Name: coh_development_process
Value: This phenotype was developed within Janssen Research & Development using the CohortDiagnostics tool and PheValuator

Name: coh_add_comms
Value: Note: This definition does not include "in-remission" or "in relapse" codes.
